page.title: 10Transport in Uxbridge
page.content: We discovered that the traffic in Uxbridge is very busy,with all kinds of vehicles such as cars,buses,lorries and motorbikes between 7.30am-9am and 5pm-7pm.The quietest time for traffic is just before mid-day.The most popular form of transport is the car. This is due to there being several car-parks and a comprehensive plan of motorways around Uxbridge.Out of 35 people we asked about their form of transport,the majority used the car,followed by Underground,walking and then the bus.The Bus Station serves several routes and the local underground station serves two lines. The Grand Union Canal,which runs through Uxbridge is a wasted waterway, as it is now used for pleasure trips only.
